title: Solar Energy Systems Technology
description: Install, maintain and repair solar energy systems for homes and businesses
description_rw: Kwinjiza, kubungabunga no gusana sisitemu z’ingufu z’imirasire y’izuba mu ngo no mu bikorwa by’ubucuruzi
growth_potential: Very High - Rwanda's renewable energy expansion creates 500+ new jobs yearly
growth_potential_rw: Hejuru cyane - Ukwaguka kw’ingufu zisubiramo mu Rwanda guteza akazi gashya 500+ buri mwaka

title: Automotive Technology & Mechanics
description: Diagnose, repair and maintain vehicles including cars, motorcycles and commercial vehicles
description_rw: Gupima, gusana no kubungabunga ibinyabiziga birimo imodoka, moto n’ibinyabiziga by’ubucuruzi
growth_potential: High - Growing vehicle ownership and transport sector
growth_potential_rw: Hejuru - Kuzamuka kw’abafite ibinyabiziga n’urwego rw’ubwikorezi

title: ICT Support & Network Administration
description: Provide technical support, maintain computer networks and help organizations with IT solutions
description_rw: Gutanga ubufasha bwa tekiniki, kubungabunga imiyoboro ya mudasobwa no gufasha imiryango ibisubizo bya IT
growth_potential: Very High - Digital transformation across all sectors
growth_potential_rw: Hejuru cyane - Impinduka za dijitali mu nzego zose

title: Electronics & Telecommunications
description: Install, repair and maintain electronic equipment, mobile networks and communication systems
description_rw: Kwinjiza, gusana no kubungabunga ibikoresho bya elekitironike, imiyoboro ya telefoni n’inzira z’itumanaho
growth_potential: High - Expanding telecommunications and smart city initiatives
growth_potential_rw: Hejuru - Ukwaguka kw’itumanaho n’imishinga ya ‘smart city’

title: Hospitality & Tourism Management
description: Manage hotels, restaurants, and tourism services to create excellent guest experiences
description_rw: Gucunga amahoteli, resitora na serivisi z’ubutembere kugira ngo uhe abashyitsi serivisi nziza
growth_potential: High - Rwanda's growing tourism industry and MICE sector
growth_potential_rw: Hejuru - Kuzamuka kw’inganda z’ubutembere mu Rwanda n’urwego rwa MICE

title: Construction & Building Technology
description: Build and maintain infrastructure including roads, buildings, and water systems
description_rw: Kubaka no kubungabunga ibikorwa remezo birimo imihanda, inyubako na sisitemu z’amazi
growth_potential: High - Major infrastructure projects and urban development
growth_potential_rw: Hejuru - Imishinga minini y’ibikorwa remezo n’iterambere ry’imijyi
